title: George Strait
summary: George Harvey Strait Sr. (born May 18, 1952) is an American country music singer, songwriter, actor, and music producer.  George Strait is known as the "King of Country"[2] and is considered one of the most influential and popular recording artists of all time.[3] He is known as a pioneer of the neotraditionalist country style and movement, cowboy look, and being one of the first and most prominent country artists to bring country music back to its roots and away from the pop country era in the 1980s.
